topics.body: Question: What's the most messed up animation you've ever watched?
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d2391c63687275f2a10d00#post_54d2391c63687275f2a10d00
What do you mean?

also, OH NO THE KITTY! TT_TT
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d23812636872756e2d0600#post_54d23812636872756e2d0600
*South East Asian:* Stubbornness (Health goes to 5 points first no matter how critical the attack is)
*American:* Freedom Cry (All companions receive Courage perk for 30 seconds)
*British:* Tea and Crumpets (restores 25% of health)
*Japanese:* Kamikaze (Attack points increase by 50%, defense decrease by 15%)
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d2393b6368727adc630600#post_54d2393b6368727adc630600
Weirdest anime or cartoon?
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body: Ok a know in show terms some super natural shits going down, but holy shit in real terms this main protagonist is NUTS.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d23a046368727abc300100#post_54d23a046368727abc300100
Well I guess the weirdest cartoon I have ever seen is Super Jail Curage the cowardly dog and Flapjack.

I CERTAINLY KNOW THERE IS MORE but I cant think of any at the moment.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d23a046368727abc300100#post_54d23a046368727abc300100
The only one tha comes to mind for me is an absolutely ancient show called O Canada. It used to be on Cartoon Network (back before Adult Swim had been invented), and it was this collection of extremely surreal animated shorts. I can't tell you anything else about it because it's been almost twenty years since I last saw it, but there you go.
